channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s in the Epstein grand jury transcripts? Former prosecutor says ‘It’s not going to be much’
item.description: “The president is trying to present himself as if he’s doing something here and it really is nothing.”

item.title: Dow futures turn higher as investors brace for a big week of earnings, housing market data and Jerome Powell
item.description: On Tuesday, Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell and Governor Michelle Bowman are due to speak at a banking conference.

item.title: Stock market’s rally now hinges on earnings, which take the spotlight this week
Top economist sounds the alarm even louder on the housing market and says homebuilders are ‘giving up’
item.description: "A big tell is that many builders are delaying their land purchases from the land banks. New home sales, starts, and completions will soon fall."

item.title: Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s future is in doubt after disastrous loss in upper-house election
item.description: The Liberal Democratic Party and its partner Komeito had to win 50 seats in Sunday's vote, but they secured only around 41, according to projections.

item.title: Trump threatens Washington Commanders’ stadium over name change
item.description: The Commanders plan to build a new stadium on land that has been managed by the US National Park Service.

item.title: Alphabet's earnings will probably be fine, but this big threat looms
U.S. stock futures flat as investors look ahead to earnings, tariff developments
They shrunk the airport lounge: Why that flight-day haven may be getting smaller
Why cheaper power looks unlikely as new budget reshuffles U.S. energy landscape
